SELECT lft.lawFirmId, lft.name, lft.profile, lft.background, lft.status, ut.nickName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UserTb ut2 WHERE ut2.lawFirmId = lft.lawFirmId AND ut2.status = 1) AS 'userCnt' FROM LawFirmTb lft LEFT JOIN UserTb ut ON(ut.userId = lft.userId)
AND lft.status = 1
AND (lft.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.keyword}, '%') OR ut.nickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.keyword}, '%'))
AND lft.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.keyword}, '%')
AND ut.nickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY
${order.property} ${order.direction}
OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'count' FROM LawFirmTb lft LEFT JOIN UserTb ut ON(ut.userId = lft.userId)
AND lft.status = 1
AND (lft.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ut.nickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND lft.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND ut.nickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT A.*, ut.profile FROM ( SELECT tt.trialId AS 'id', 0 as 'type',tt.postType, tt.title, tt.writer, tt.writeDt, tt.`view`, tt.recommendCount, tt.commentCount, null as 'lineType', tt.userId, tt.status, tt.lawFirmId FROM TrialTb tt
AND tt.lawFirmId = #{data.lawFirmId} AND tt.status = 1
) A LEFT JOIN UserTb ut ON(A.userId = ut.userId)
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{data.keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY
${order.property} ${order.direction}
OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT tt.trialId AS 'id', 0 as 'type',tt.postType, tt.title, tt.writer, tt.writeDt, tt.`view`, tt.recommendCount, tt.commentCount, null as 'lineType', tt.userId, tt.status, tt.lawFirmId FROM TrialTb tt
AND tt.lawFirmId = #{lawFirmId} AND tt.status = 1
) A
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
